description: This Java source file defines a Spring configuration class 'CorsConfig' that sets up Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) policies for local development, enabling specific origins, HTTP methods, headers, and credentials.

classes.name: CorsConfig
classes.description: Spring configuration class that defines a CORS filter for local development environments.

methods.name: corsFilter
methods.description: Creates and configures a CorsFilter bean with allowed origins, methods, headers, credentials, and max age for CORS policy.
